scenes.prompt: Split screen: Perplexity AI logo on left, Google logo on right, versus symbol in center, dramatic lighting, tech showdown aesthetic
Hands typing identical search query into both Perplexity and Google simultaneously, dual screens, professional workspace, fast-paced typing
Google results showing traditional blue links and ads, cluttered interface, user scrolling through multiple pages, frustrated expression
Perplexity showing clean AI-generated answer with sources cited, user reading with amazed expression, highlighted key points, superior UX
User closing Google tab and bookmarking Perplexity, satisfied smile, laptop screen glowing, winner clear, modern office

ChatGPT generating code with basic structure, user reviewing with skeptical expression, code editor showing gaps and issues highlighted in red
